subtitle: Avocado, pink grapefruit and bacon combine in this colourful starter.

method.text: Place the grapefruit juice in a bowl. Add the avocado slices. Toss to coat well and to help prevent discolouration. Chill the grapefruit segments and avocado for 30 min.
Meanwhile, place the bacon under a preheated medium grill. Grill for 3-5 min or until crispy. Remove from grill. Chop into pieces.
Remove the avocado from the grapefruit juice. Arrange the grapefruit segments and avocado on serving plates with the chopped bacon.
Sprinkle over the walnuts and black pepper. Serve immediately.

title: Avocado and grapefruit fan
